definitions.definition: Secluded from society (of a lifestyle, activity etc.); private , quiet .
Of a place, far from civilization, not able to be easily seen or accessed; secluded .
Having left employment , especially on reaching pensionable age. [from 16th c.] ( of people )
examples: The retired workers are a major expense due to their pensions.

definitions.definition: No longer in use or production.
examples: Following Jackie Robinson's success, his uniform number, 42, became a retired number across all major league teams.

main_definition: Secluded from society (of a lifestyle, activity etc.); private , quiet . [from 16th c.]
